璱字的基本解释

璱
sè
（玉）鲜艳光洁的样子。

璱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sè］
［《廣韻》所櫛切，入櫛，生。］
玉色鲜洁貌。

璱字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　璱； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页743第18
【唐韻】所櫛切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】色櫛切，?音瑟。【說文】玉英華相，帶如瑟弦。詩曰：璱彼玉瓚。◎按《詩·大雅》今本作瑟。　又【玉篇】淸淨鮮潔也。【廣韻】玉鮮潔貌。　又【韻會】一曰璱璱，碧珠也。通作瑟瑟。　【類篇】亦作㻭。

[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　璱; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 743 Page 18
[Tang Yun] All cuts [Ji Yun] [Rhymes] [Zheng Yun] Color cuts,? Yinse. [Speaking text] Yuying Huaxiang, with a string like a serpent. The poem said: Zanbi Yuzhan. ◎According to the present edition of "Poetry·Daya", it is written as Se.　[Jade Chapter] It’s clean and fresh. 【Guangyun】The jade is fresh and clean.　[Rhyme Club] One said, Laiyan, Bizhu.
